alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 25 at 9:06AM ChST until May 26 at 12:45AM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible in the outer rain bands as Mawar moves away. * WHERE...Guam. * WHEN...Through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Extensive street flooding and flooding of creeks and rivers are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Showers and thunderstorms producing additional rainfall of 1 to 3 inches possible. With 15 to 25 inches of rain already fallen on Guam, flash flooding could easily occur with this type of rainfall. Especially over central and southern Guam. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
